#summary Current status of project implementation

=Current status of project implementation=

This page gives links to the latest working versions of documents and software that are being (or have been) developed under this project. "Released draft" or "Released version" is a link to the most recent version that is posted on the OLAC site. "Latest working draft" is a link to an even later draft that is publicly accessible in the Subversion repository. "Latest working version" is a link to a publicly accessible page on the OLAC site that is not yet in production, that is, it is not yet accessible from links on the site.

*Regarding Outcome 1.1:* [Metadata Metadata quality]

New document: _OLAC Metadata Usage Guidelines,_ [http://www.language-archives.org/NOTE/usage.html Released draft] [http://olac.googlecode.com/svn/web/NOTE/usage-new.html Latest working draft]

New document: _OLAC Metadata Metrics,_ [http://www.language-archives.org/NOTE/metrics.html Released draft] [http://olac.googlecode.com/svn/web/NOTE/metrics-new.html Latest working draft]

New page: OLAC metrics, [http://www.language-archives.org/metrics/ Latest working version]

Revised page: List of participating archives with links to new metrics and new metadata quality analysis, [http://www.language-archives.org/archives-new.php Latest working version]

Revised page: Free-standing metadata service with new button for performing metadata quality analysis, [http://www.language-archives.org/tools/metadata/freestanding.html Released version]
